articles.title: The Most Surprising Drink for Weight Loss, Says Dietitian | Eat This Not That - Eat This, Not That
articles.description: According to a dietitian, the best flat-belly beverage to help create a calorie deficit is 1% low-fat milk.

articles.title: Zika virus detected in India's Kerala state | The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News — World — The Guardian Nigeria News – Nigeria and World News - Guardian
articles.description: Authorities in India's southern Kerala region have issued a statewide alert after a case of the Zika virus was confirmed, officials said Friday.
articles.content:

Authorities in India’s southern Kerala region have issued a statewide alert after a case of the Zika virus was confirmed, officials said Friday.
